channel.title: How much IATI data is being used in practice?
channel.description:
I have been looking for data to understand resources for university building in my country. I have found data on webpage for example http://www.openaidsearch.org/ give good outline but it can be complicated to find and work with data in original format XML.
I notice main IATI webpage have words "IATI makes information about aid spending easier to access, use and understand.". Also "IATI Standard is a technical publishing framework allowing data to be compared".
I have one question: what are real world uses of IATI data? How has this use had result of making better result in real world for everyone?
Thank you very much.

item.title: How much IATI data is being used in practice?

item.description:
As this topic is to do with data use, I am moving this topic to Community Zone - Using IATI Data.

item.title: How much IATI data is being used in practice?

item.description:
I have been looking for data to understand resources for university building in my country. I have found data on webpage for example http://www.openaidsearch.org/ give good outline but it can be complicated to find and work with data in original format XML.

I notice main IATI webpage have words “IATI makes information about aid spending easier to access, use and understand.”. Also “IATI Standard is a technical publishing framework allowing data to be compared”.

I have one question: what are real world uses of IATI data? How has this use had result of making better result in real world for everyone?

Thank you very much.
